title: Top 5 Shoulder Mobility Drills
description: A curated set of mobility drills designed to improve shoulder range of motion and reduce stiffness.

exercises.name: Arm Circles
exercises.instructions: Stand tall with arms extended to the side. Rotate arms forward in small circles, gradually increasing the size.
tips: Keep your core engaged to avoid swinging the torso.
Move slowly to warm the joint safely.
Increase circle size only if comfortable.

exercises.name: Shoulder Pass-Throughs
exercises.instructions: Hold a stick or resistance band wide. Bring it over your head and behind your back while keeping arms straight.
tips: Move in a slow controlled arc.

exercises.name: Wall Slides
exercises.instructions: Stand with back against a wall, elbows bent at 90°. Slide arms up while keeping wrists and elbows touching the wall.
tips: Maintain contact with the wall throughout.
Keep ribcage down and core tight.
Move slowly to feel scapular movement.

exercises.name: Scapular Retractions
exercises.instructions: Stand or sit tall. Pull your shoulder blades back and down without shrugging.
tips: Imagine putting shoulder blades into your back pockets.

exercises.name: Thread the Needle
exercises.instructions: Start on all fours. Slide one arm underneath the body and rotate torso, stretching the upper back and shoulder.
tips: Exhale as you rotate into the stretch.

title: Beginner-Friendly Core Finishers
description: Quick and simple core finisher routines designed for beginners to build foundational core strength.

exercises.name: Dead Bug
exercises.instructions: Lie on your back, arms extended toward ceiling and knees bent at 90°. Lower opposite arm and leg while keeping core braced.
tips: Press lower back into the floor.

exercises.name: Plank Hold
exercises.instructions: Place elbows under shoulders and keep body in a straight line from head to heels.

exercises.name: Heel Touches
exercises.instructions: Lie on back with knees bent. Reach side-to-side tapping heels while engaging obliques.

exercises.name: Bird Dog
exercises.instructions: Start on all fours. Extend opposite arm and leg while keeping hips level.

exercises.name: Flutter Kicks
exercises.instructions: Lie flat with hands under hips. Lift legs slightly off the ground and kick alternately.
tips: Keep core engaged to protect lower back.

title: Improve Flexibility in 7 Minutes
description: A fast and effective full-body flexibility routine ideal for daily stretching.

exercises.name: Hamstring Stretch
exercises.instructions: Sit or stand and hinge forward from the hips to stretch the back of the thigh.
tips: Avoid bending from the lower back.
Relax into the stretch with slow breaths.

exercises.name: Quad Stretch
exercises.instructions: Stand tall and pull one foot toward glutes while keeping knees aligned.

exercises.name: Hip Flexor Stretch
exercises.instructions: From a half-kneeling position, gently lean forward to feel stretch in front of hip.

exercises.name: Upper Back Stretch
exercises.instructions: Sit or stand, interlock fingers, push arms forward and round upper back to feel stretch between shoulder blades.

exercises.name: Calf Stretch
exercises.instructions: Stand facing a wall, place one leg behind, and push heel down to stretch the calf.
tips: Press heel firmly into the ground.
